org.ingatan
Class ThemeConstants

java.lang.Object
  org.ingatan.ThemeConstants

public abstract class ThemeConstants
extends java.lang.Object

Encapsulates common colours used throughout the program.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
